The '''House of the Mírdain''' was the guildhouse and chief dwelling of [[Celebrimbor]] and the jewelsmiths of [[Eregion]] - the [[Gwaith-i-Mírdain]]. It contained the smithies and the treasures of the Mírdain.<ref>{{UT|Concerning}}</ref> It was destroyed by the forces of [[Sauron]] in {{SA|1697}} when he invaded [[Eriador]].<ref>{{App|B1}}</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''2022: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:The House of the Mírdain stood at the center of [[Ost-in-Edhil|Caras Gelebren]]. Its [[Sack of Eregion|fall]] is depicted in a flashback, where the players play the parts of the defenders.
